  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void activationPhase()
    activationPhase(): the effect of the cards in the player's register will be called after the 5th register pickDamage will be called to get the damage cards after that the registers will be cleared for the next round
    void activePhase()
    activePhase(): current phase

    addPlayer(): adds a player to the game.

    blueBeltMovement(): checks if a player is standing on a blueBelt and moves them

    buildingPhase(): method checks if currentPlayer set his starting point if the player did, it's the next players turn to choose his starting point

    this function is called, when multiple robots have the same distance to the priorityAntenna

    cheating(): this function is for cheating to check single functions/effects of the game by getting a message

    cheatingEffects(): this function will be called by the cheating function to run the field effects even when you are not in the activation phase

    checkMapEnd(): checks if there is a map end at the next player's position

    java.lang.Boolean checkPlayIt()
    checkPlayIt(): checks if all players sent playIt.
    void checkPointReached()
    checks if any player is standing on his next checkPoint if yes the checkPoint Counter is increased if checkPointCounter == controlPoints.size() --> player won the game checkPointReached():
    boolean checkPosition​(int position)
    checkPosition(): checks if a player is on a certain Position
    boolean checkRobot​(int nextX, int nextY, int orientation, PlayerThread player)
    checkRobot(): checks if there is a robot in the way of the current robot if there is a robot, the other robot will be pushed after checking if there is a wall
    void checkRobotRestartPoint​(Robot movedRobot, int restartDirection)
    checkRobotRestartPoint(): looks if there is a robot standing on the RestartPoint if yes, it pushes the robot into the direction of the "RestartPoint" and checks recursively if another Robot is blocking that spot

    damageEffect(): this effect is called when a Spam, TrojanHorse, Virus Card is played it plays the top programming card of your deck and puts the damageCard back to the DamageCardDeck

    • placeOnRegister

      public void placeOnRegister​(int register, Card card, PlayerThread player)
      placeOnRegisters(): Puts card on register. Once the 5th register is filled, a selectionFinished message is sent to all players and if a timer is not running, a new timer will be started.
      Parameters:
      register - : register on which the card should be placed
      card - : card to be placed.
      player - : the player placing the card

    • discardRemainingCards

      public void discardRemainingCards​(PlayerThread player)
      puts all 9 Programming cards the discardPile after the 5th register has been played, damageCards are put in their damageCardPiles
      Parameters:
      player - PlayerThread

    • discardHand

      public void discardHand​(PlayerThread player)
      discardHand(): empties player's registers and discards the cards in the discarded pile. when the player couldn't fill his registers in time.
      Parameters:
      player - player who the timer ran out on during card selection

    • discardCard

      public void discardCard​(Register register, PlayerThread player)
      discardCard(): removes a card from the register and adds it to the discardedPile
      Parameters:
      register - : the register that contains the card

      Parameters:
      player - : player who'll be dealt the cards
      force - : true if timer ended. player is given 5 cards to be added to his registers

    • checkWall

      public boolean checkWall​(int currentX, int currentY, int nextX, int nextY, int orientation)
      checkWall(): checks if there is a wall in front of the player (on the field he stands or on the field he wants to go)
      Parameters:
      currentX - : xPosition of the field the player stands at the moment
      currentY - : yPosition of the field the player stands at the moment
      nextX - : xPosition of the field the player wants to go
      nextY - : yPosition of the field the player wants to go
      orientation - : the orientation of the robot
      Returns:
      true, if there is a wall in the way

    • checkPit

      public boolean checkPit​(int nextX, int nextY)

      Parameters:
      nextX - : xPosition of the field the player wants to go
      nextY - : yPosition of the field the player wants to go
      Returns:
      true, if there is a pit on the given position

      nextY - : yPosition of the field the player wants to go
      Returns:

    • checkRobot

      public boolean checkRobot​(int nextX, int nextY, int orientation, PlayerThread player)
      checkRobot(): checks if there is a robot in the way of the current robot if there is a robot, the other robot will be pushed after checking if there is a wall
      Parameters:
      nextX -
      nextY -
      orientation -
      player -
      Returns:
      true, if there is a robot, which can be moved

    • checkRobotStartingPosition

      public boolean checkRobotStartingPosition​(Robot originalBot, Robot movedRobot, int preferredX, int preferredY)
      checkRobotStartingPosition():
      Parameters:
      originalBot - the rebooting robot
      movedRobot - the robot that looks if another robot is standing in his way (first recursion: also the rebooting robot)
      preferredX - the X position the robot wants to move to
      preferredY - the Y position the robot wants to move to
      Returns:
      true if the originalBot can reboot on his Startingboard, false if he can't

    • checkRobotRestartPoint

      public void checkRobotRestartPoint​(Robot movedRobot, int restartDirection)
      checkRobotRestartPoint(): looks if there is a robot standing on the RestartPoint if yes, it pushes the robot into the direction of the "RestartPoint" and checks recursively if another Robot is blocking that spot
      Parameters:
      movedRobot - the rebooting Robot
      restartDirection - the direction of the RebootPoint

    • setRebootPoint

      public void setRebootPoint​(Robot yourRobot, PlayerThread player)
      setRobotPoint(): sets the robots position to the restartPoint OR to the StartingPoint sets the robots orientation to 1 (north) sends out a JSONObject with messageType "Movement"
      Parameters:
      yourRobot - the robot that has to reboot
      player - the playerThread that has to reboot

    • rebootRobot

      public void rebootRobot​(Robot robot, PlayerThread player)
      rebootRobot(): empties the registers deactivates the Robots Lasers sends out a JSONObject with messageType "Reboot"
      Parameters:
      robot - robot that has to reboot
      player - playerThread of the robot

    • damageEffect

      public void damageEffect​(PlayerThread player, Robot robot, java.lang.String damageCard)
      damageEffect(): this effect is called when a Spam, TrojanHorse, Virus Card is played it plays the top programming card of your deck and puts the damageCard back to the DamageCardDeck
      Parameters:
      player - PlayerThread of the Robot
      robot - Robot that played the damageCard
      damageCard - the damageCard, that was played

    • shootAllLasers

      public void shootAllLasers()

    • checkLaserObstacles

      public boolean checkLaserObstacles​(int xPos, int yPos, int orientation)
      checkLaserObstacles(): checks if a robot is on the Position of the "moving" Laser and if the laser isn't stopped by anything it moves one Position further. the player gets a spam card if hit
      Parameters:
      xPos -
      yPos -
      orientation -
      Returns:
      true, if the laser hit nothing on the given x and y coordinates

    • checkPointReached

      public void checkPointReached()
      checks if any player is standing on his next checkPoint if yes the checkPoint Counter is increased if checkPointCounter == controlPoints.size() --> player won the game checkPointReached():

    • priotityAntenna

      public void priotityAntenna()
      sets the order on which the players move

    • calculateAntennaDistance

      public int calculateAntennaDistance​(int xPos, int yPos)
      Parameters:
      xPos - xPosition of the Robot
      yPos - yPosition of the Robot
      Returns:
      returns the distance to the priorityAntenna

    • calculatePriority

      public void calculatePriority​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> arrList)
      this function is called, when multiple robots have the same distance to the priorityAntenna
      Parameters:
      arrList - an arrayList with at least 2 playerIDs which have the same distance to the antenna sorts the players depending on their distance to the imaginary line of the priorityAntenna

    • cheating

      public static void cheating​(java.lang.String message, PlayerThread player)
      cheating(): this function is for cheating to check single functions/effects of the game by getting a message
      Parameters:
      message - the received message from the chat
      player - the player who sent the message

    • cheatingEffects

      public void cheatingEffects()
      cheatingEffects(): this function will be called by the cheating function to run the field effects even when you are not in the activation phase
